summary: 17 CFR § 230.901 specifies that for the purposes of section 5 of the Securities Act of 1933, terms like "offer," "sell," and "sale" pertain to transactions within the United States, excluding those occurring outside the country. This regulation clarifies the geographic scope of these terms under the Act.
